all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
For after much tribulation, as I have said unto you in a former commandment, cometh the blessing.
Doctrine and Covenants 103:12
Quote of the Day
"All of our Father’s gifts flow from and are activated by the Saviour’s willing offering in Gethsemane and on the cross and His triumphant Resurrection."
Elder Patrick Kearon | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
